details.COBALT: Job scheduler used to distribute tasks across nodes.
details.Tensorflow: Machine learning framework for training deep neural networks.
details.MPICH: Message passing interface library for parallel computing.
details.Darshan: Profiling library for performance analysis of parallel IO.
details.Python: Programming language for scripting and application development.
details.HDF5: Data format for storing and accessing large datasets.
details.CPU: Number of cores and threads used for parallel execution.
details.Memory: Amount of RAM required for data storage and computation.
details.Network: Bandwidth and latency for data transfer between nodes.
details.Storage: Disk space for storing data and log files.
